mapper.sql: id , boss_id, address, owner_name, owner_phone_number, payee_name, payee_phone_number, contract_start_time, contract_end_time, rented_type, creator_name, create_time,updator_name, update_time, is_deleted,contract_code,payor_type,payee_account
mapper.insert: insert into house_info (boss_id, address, owner_name, owner_phone_number, payee_name, payee_phone_number, contract_start_time, contract_end_time, contract_code, payor_type, payee_account, rented_type, creator_name, create_time, updator_name, update_time, is_deleted) values (#{bossId}, #{address}, #{ownerName}, #{ownerPhoneNumber}, #{payeeName}, #{payeePhoneNumber}, #{contractStartTime}, #{contractEndTime}, #{contractCode}, #{payorType}, #{payeeAccount}, #{rentedType}, #{creatorName}, #{createTime}, #{updatorName}, #{updateTime}, 0)
mapper.update:
update house_info
boss_id = #{bossId},
address = #{address},
owner_name = #{ownerName},
owner_phone_number = #{ownerPhoneNumber},
payee_name = #{payeeName},
payee_phone_number = #{payeePhoneNumber},
contract_start_time = #{contractStartTime},
contract_end_time = #{contractEndTime},
rented_type = #{rentedType},
creator_name = #{creatorName},
updator_name = #{updatorName},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
contract_code = #{contractCode},
payor_type = #{payorType},
payee_account = #{payeeAccount},
where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0
